subject: SSN5844
description_text:
hello i ordered a set of pedal elastomers on january 7th and still haven’t gotten any update on shipping
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Evan Summar,  I’ll check it for you first and get back to you as soon as possible.
Hi Evan Summar,    I apologize for not updating you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Please confirm.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047231333102
